name: Response to PowerShell-Based Data Exfiltration Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access to the internal network and executed a PowerShell script that exfiltrated sensitive data.

action--4a7e5e90-e7c8-4ee4-bf7e-c381f67e.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--4a7e5e90-e7c8-4ee4-bf7e-c381f67e.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process immediately.

action--ebc5c092-a0e8-4742-872c-0e896c9b.name: Block outbound connections to suspicious IP
action--ebc5c092-a0e8-4742-872c-0e896c9b.description: Block all outbound connections to a predefined suspicious IP.

action--38ce4c4e-e618-4db2-bcf0-3e81f1d6.name: Run security scan
action--38ce4c4e-e618-4db2-bcf0-3e81f1d6.description: Perform a comprehensive security scan to identify any remaining threats.

while-condition--b4b479be-567e-45e3-90ad.name: Scan Cleaning Loop
while-condition--b4b479be-567e-45e3-90ad.description: Repeat the security scan until a clean result is obtained.

action--b4cf5861-0207-484e-8d3f-5dc5126a.name: Review user access permissions
action--b4cf5861-0207-484e-8d3f-5dc5126a.description: Check user access permissions to ensure no unnecessary access.

action--f1ffc19a-83ef-4fb4-8df4-fb8384ee.name: Update firewall rules based on threat intelligence
action--f1ffc19a-83ef-4fb4-8df4-fb8384ee.description: Adjust firewall rules to reject traffic from a known threat IP.

parallel--0c105072-c95a-42b4-b508-3b8c77.name: Mitigation Steps
parallel--0c105072-c95a-42b4-b508-3b8c77.description: Run simultaneous mitigation actions including a security scan and review user access permissions.
